comment: Associative law for the biconditional. An axiom of system DS in Vladimir Lifschitz, "On calculational proofs", Annals of Pure and Applied Logic, 113:207-224, 2002, ~ http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/ai-lab/pub-view.php?PubID=26805 . Interestingly, this law was not included in _Principia Mathematica_ but was apparently first noted by Jan Lukasiewicz circa 1923. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Juha Arpiainen, 19-Jan-2006.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Sep-2013.)
